text: John Beard Haviland is an anthropological linguist, or linguistic anthropologist, from the United States. Some of his major research has been with speakers of Tzotzil (Mayan) Chiapas, Mexico, and with Paman languages of Cape York Peninsula in the Commonwealth of Australia. ==Bibliography== *“Guugu Yimidhirr” in R. M. W. Dixon and Barry J. Blake (editors), Handbook of Australian Languages. Canberra 1979. Pages 27–180. *Sk’op Sotz’leb; El Tzotzil de San Lorenzo Zinacantán.
